courseDetails.title: ISO 31000 Certified Risk Manager Program
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering ISO 31000: A Comprehensive Risk Management Course
courseDetails.longDescription:
Risk is present in every aspect of our life, from mundane everyday activities such as choosing a route to work, to complex corporate decisions such as opening a manufacturing plant in a different country. Much effort was put over the past decades to better understand risk and its nature, which led to the creation of methodologies and approaches that enable individuals and organizations to make accurate decisions based on logical reasoning.

One of the most distinguished frameworks to address risk is provided by ISO 31000, an international standard that incorporates principles, proven practices, and guidelines on managing risks faced by organizations.

What is ISO 31000?

ISO 31000 is an international standard that provides guidelines on managing any type of risk in any business activity. The standard provides guidelines on principles, risk management framework, and application of the risk management process.

ISO 31000 applies to organizations of all sizes seeking to integrate risk management into business functions. It covers the risk management principles which are the foundation for managing risk, and guides organizations in developing a risk management framework by:

  • Integrating risk management into organizational structures

  • Designing a framework for managing risk that fits the organization’s context

  • Implementing the risk management framework

  • Evaluating the effectiveness and continually improving the suitability and adequacy of the risk management framework

  • Demonstrating leadership and commitment (top management)

ISO 31000 considers the risk management process integral to overall management and decision-making. The risk management process can be applied on a strategic level and organization-wide, but it can also be applied to projects, products, and processes. ISO 31000 provides guidelines on risk communication and consultation, defining the scope, context, and criteria, risk assessment, risk treatment, monitoring and review, and lastly, recording and reporting of risks
targetAudiences: Risk Managers and Practitioners
Executives and Decision-Makers
Project Managers
Compliance and Governance Professionals
Quality Managers
Internal and External Auditors
Financial Professionals

courseDetails.title: Amazon No Content, Publish Profitable KDP Low Content Books
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn How to Generate Long-Term Passive Income from Amazon KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing).
courseDetails.longDescription:
Whether you're a seasoned author or a novice looking to break into the world of Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP), this course provides you with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the complexities of the platform and maximize your success.

Course Highlights:


  1. 30 Tips for KDP Publishers: Learn practical tips and strategies to enhance your publishing experience on KDP.

  2. Amazon Book Category Finder: Discover how to effectively categorize your books on Amazon for increased visibility and discoverability.

  3. Best Niche for Amazon: Identify lucrative niches that align with your interests and have the potential for success on the Amazon platform.

  4. Big Secret: How to Upload Paperback Books on Amazon KDP: Uncover the insider techniques for seamlessly uploading paperback books on Amazon KDP.

  5. Create Acceptable No-Bleed Book Cover: Master the art of designing book covers that meet Amazon's standards without bleed issues.

  6. Create Low Content Bestselling Book Cover: Explore the key elements of designing compelling low-content book covers that sell.

  7. Creating Author Central Page: Establish your author presence on Amazon with a professionally crafted Author Central page.

  8. Creating Ranking Titles and Descriptions: Learn the strategies behind crafting titles and descriptions that boost your book's ranking on Amazon.

  9. Designing and Producing Low Content Interiors (Many Pages): Dive into the details of designing engaging and marketable interiors for your low-content books.

  10. How to Create and Add the 7 Most Important Keywords: Master the art of keyword selection and placement to optimize your book's discoverability.

  11. How to Create a KDP Account: Step-by-step guidance on setting up your KDP account for a smooth start to your publishing journey.

  12. Introduction to Low Content Definition and Types: Understand the concept of low-content books and explore various types to find your niche.

  13. KDP Keywords: Explore the power of creating compelling content to market your books.

  14. Keyword Research: Unlock the secrets of effective keyword research to enhance your book's visibility on Amazon.

  15. Know and Assess Your Publishing Goals: Set clear and achievable publishing goals tailored to your individual aspirations and objectives.

  16. List of No-Content Books: Gain insights into popular no-content book ideas to inspire your creative process.

  17. Low Content No Book Content Tools (Before Keyword Research): Explore essential tools for creating engaging low-content books before diving into keyword research.

  18. Practical Method to Creating Low Content Books: A hands-on approach to crafting low-content books that resonate with your target audience.

  19. Pros and Cons of Amazon KDP: Evaluate the advantages and challenges of using Amazon KDP to make informed decisions for your publishing journey.

  20. Protect Your Account from Hackers: Implement security measures to safeguard your KDP account and protect your valuable content.

Enroll now to elevate your KDP publishing game and turn your passion for writing into a successful and sustainable business!
targetAudiences: Anyone looking to generate passive income through KDP Publishing
Entrepreneurs who would like to build another source of income
Anyone interested in creating an online business with global Self-Publishing opportunities

courseDetails.title: Curso de Manualidades y Adornos Navideños
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a realizar manualidades y adornos navideños para decorar tu casa e iniciar tu propio negocio.
courseDetails.longDescription:
En nuestro Curso de Manualidades y Adornos Navideños vas a aprender a elaborar adornos y regalos navideños como zapatos, caballos y campanas de navidad en miniatura.

Si eres un amante de la Navidad, este es el curso que estabas esperando, en él podrás hacer paso a paso adornos navideños y te ayudamos a decorar tu hogar y árbol navideño en estas fechas. El curso se compone de vídeos para que puedas ver el proceso de creación paso a paso y patrones de todo lo que te enseñamos.

Con este curso podrás sorprender a tus invitados cuando vayan a tu casa y también podrás obsequiarles sencillos, pero originales regalos navideños.

Podrás aprender técnicas, trucos y mucho más. Te enseñamos a trabajar con tela pana, corospun, dulopillo, cordón dorado, cinta dorada, etc. Lo más importante es que vas a poder desconectar del día día y relajarte, desarrollar tu imaginación y vivir la Navidad desde ya.

Antes de comenzar cualquiera de las manualidades, te decimos qué materiales necesitas y también te damos opciones de otros materiales que puedes utilizar, en el caso de que no puedas conseguir los originales del curso.

¿Y entonces qué? ¿Te animas? Te damos más razones por las que te deberías apuntar a este curso: Ahorrarás dinero en Navidad y podrás iniciar tu propio negocio en estas fechas especiales. Ya sabes que decorar tu casa en estas fechas puede ser caro, pero en este curso te damos la opción de hacerlo tú mismo y por lo tanto, de que te salga más barato. Además, la mayoría de las manualidades que te ofrecemos las puedes hacer con tus hijos.

Te animamos a que descubras tu lado más creativo, e iniciar tu propio negocio y puedas vender tus creaciones.

Cuando compres este curso, tendrás acceso inmediato y sin caducidad. Aunque lo compres ya, lo podrás hacer cuando te vaya bien. No necesitas experiencia previa, simplemente ganas de pasar un rato agradable y de hacer volar tu imaginación.

El curso lo puedes pagar con Paypal, tarjeta de crédito o cuenta bancaria, es un pago 100 % seguro y además tienes 30 días para probarlo y si no es lo que esperabas, lo devuelves.

En el video de presentación podrás ver todos los adornos que vamos a elaborar.


¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y nos vemos en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Victor Manuel Yacolca Laos
targetAudiences: Emprendedores que deseen iniciar su propio negocio, vendiendo sus adornos y creaciones.
Personas que deseen dedicarse a la enseñanza de las artes manuales.
Personas que deseen desarrollar su creatividad e imaginación, elaborando sus propios adornos y creaciones.
Personas que deseen desconectarse de la rutina, elaborando su propios adornos y creaciones.

courseDetails.title: Publish Coloring, Illustration, Cookbooks for Passive Income
courseDetails.shortDescription: Design book interior, Paperback Easily on Canva, & Self-Publish on Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) to Make Money
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course reveals the secrets to passive income by mastering the art of publishing coloring books, illustrations, recipes, and cookbooks. In this comprehensive course, you will learn how to design captivating content effortlessly using Canva and leverage Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) to monetize your creations.

Key Highlights:

  • Master Canva Design: Learn how to effortlessly craft visually stunning content on Canva, from eye-catching book covers to engaging illustrations.

  • Self-Publishing on KDP: Dive into the world of self-publishing on Amazon KDP and discover how to navigate the platform like a pro.

  • Keyword Optimization: Discover effective strategies to find high-ranking keywords for your books, bypassing the need for costly tools like Publisher Rocket.

  • Author Central Mastery: Master the potential of Amazon Author Central to enhance your book listings and increase visibility.

  • Children's Book Covers: Step-by-step guidance on designing professional-grade covers for children's books, ensuring your creations stand out in the market.

  • Illustration Creation: Learn the tricks and tips to effortlessly create, write, and publish illustration books, captivating your audience with compelling visuals.

  • Coloring Book Design: Harness the power of Canva to create captivating coloring books and monetize them effectively on Amazon KDP.

  • Cover Design Mastery: Utilize Canva's templates to design attention-grabbing covers for various book genres, boosting your sales and visibility.

  • Notebook Creation: Explore the lucrative world of KDP Journals and Low-Content Books by learning how to design college notebooks and covers from the comfort of your home using Canva.

  • Cookbook Cover Design: Dive into the intricacies of designing cookbook covers that entice readers and drive sales.

  • Fiction Book Cover Design: You will learn the secret to designing compelling covers for fiction books that resonate with your target audience.


Enroll now and unleash your creativity while building a profitable passive income stream through Canva design and Amazon KDP publishing.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in online entrepreneurship: Individuals seeking to explore opportunities in the digital publishing industry and learn how to leverage platforms like KDP for income generation.
